basics.summary: Passionate technologist, fast learner and problem solver. I'm working as a web Solution Designer/Application Designer for DXC Technology. I'm a proud geek and have extensive experience in designing and building highly performant and scalable full stack web applications or products for cloud using agile methodologies. I hope to pursue a role where I can use my technical and domain experience to design & build meaningful applications.

work.summary: Exceed is a multi-tier P&C insurance product used by Aviva UK to serve its general insurance customers across UK. Exceed is used to process all policy and claims processing for Aviva UK direct general insurance within contact center and digital channels. Other than direct business for Aviva UK, Exceed is also used to process policies from all Aviva's corporate partners inlcuding HSBC,Barclays,TSB,Santander etc.
highlights: Implementation Lead/Application SME for Exceed cloud migration program at client location Norwich,UK
Implementation lead for DXC Aviva UK innovation hub which has so far converted 4 POC technology work into full blown client funded projects
Responsible for developing architecture and design artifacts for migrating on premise Exceed application into AWS cloud for Aviva UK
Designed & developed Exceed SQL CI&CD pipelines for AWS cloud.
Implemented web services virtualization on Exceed using CA LISA.
Implemented monitoring solutions for Exceed using App Dynamics and Splunk.
Managed various business critical deliveries with minimal issues which indirectly contributed significantly in improving CSAT scores for account over the years.
Responsible for estimation, impact analysis, creation of HLD and LLD docs, build, code reviews and mentoring.
